plot: Otto gets his revenge on Lord Grant by telling the CTA (Cruelty to Animals) a sinister organisation that he is badly treating his prize hunting hounds. Class orientated liberals they jump at the chance to cause Lord Grant some pain.
title: Jailhouse Dog
plot_es: Otto gets his revenge on Lord Grant by telling the CTA (Cruelty to Animals) a sinister organisation that he is badly treating his prize hunting hounds. Class orientated liberals they jump at the chance to cause Lord Grant some pain.
